de.polygonal.gl.color.ColorMatrix

type
class
A highly optimized HaXe port of the AS3 ColorMatrix Class by Mario Klingemann.
see http://www.quasimondo.com/archives/000565.php

Static Variables

blendMatrixMatrix(inline,null) : A : ColorMatrix -> B : ColorMatrix -> C : ColorMatrix -> amount : Float -> ColorMatrix

mulMatrixMatrix(inline,null) : A : ColorMatrix -> B : ColorMatrix -> C : ColorMatrix -> ColorMatrix
